Articles.Content:
I have the Steam version of KSP, and the loading bar shows up, but stuck at halfway and with no parts showing.I have tried this on both x32 and x64 (my PC is x64).

Thanks!
Run as administrator . I had exact same problem and this worked for me.

Hi endomen,

We'll need more info to help you out.
Most importantly the log file : C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.log

Does the KSP is modded ?
If so you should try without any mods (just move the data from C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\Gamedata\ to another location, LEAVING the folder SQUAD)

You also should try to check KSP files with steam :
On your library, right-click KSP, select "properties", then "local files" and start the integrity check.

26 minutes ago, MrGeekArt said:

You also should try to check KSP files with steam :
On your library, right-click KSP, select "properties", then "local files" and start the integrity check.

This worked. Now I can get back to launching rockets again! Thanks!
